meanings.definition: Having the most desirable qualities or characteristics
meanings.sent1: The cake was the plummiest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always picks the plummiest fruits from the market.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the softest pillow was the plummiest for a nap.
meanings.sent4: Among all the stars, she shone the plummiest in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The plummiest flower in the garden attracted the most bees.

meanings.definition: To choose or select the best or most desirable option
meanings.sent1: He plummiest the perfect gift for his mom's birthday.
meanings.sent2: They always plummiest the best movies to watch together.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed to plummiest the comfiest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: She plummiest the juiciest apple from the tree.
meanings.sent5: The chef will plummiest the freshest ingredients for the dish.

meanings.definition: To become more plump or full in appearance
meanings.sent1: After eating, the bread dough will plummiest in the oven.
meanings.sent2: The balloon started to plummiest as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent3: The clouds seemed to plummiest before the rain started.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks began to plummiest with a rosy blush.
meanings.sent5: The plant will plummiest with water and sunlight.
